description:
Misha and the others go to the spa theme park that everyone is currently talking about. Misha got tickets from Midori and she invited Washiwashi and Yui to come along. But then suddenly, Tsubame shows up...
 
Misha is watching an anime with a very clumsy maid and says that it looks like anyone can be a maid. Tsubame hears this and tells her that it’s not true, but then Misha decides to prove her wrong.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma domestique est vraiment, vraiment insupportable
My Maid Is Still Seriously Way Too Annoying...
Uchi no Maid wa Yappari Mou Honto Uzainda naa......
うちのメイドはやっぱりもうホントウザいんだなあ......
